text:
There will be no power supply from 9.45 a.m. to 2 p.m. on Thursday in the following areas of the city owing to maintenance work to be taken up by the Tangedco at its K.Sathanur Sub_Station:

K.K.Nagar, Indian Bank Colony, SMESC Colony, Krishnamurthy Nagar, Sundar Nagar, Ayyappa Nagar, LIC Colony, Palani Nagar, Mullai Nagar, RVS Nagar, Vasantha Nagar, Wireless Road, Sembattu, Kuditheru, Bharathi Nagar, Kamaraj Nagar, J.K.Nagar, Santhosh Nagar, Ananda Nagar, K.Sathanur, Olaiyur, Vadugapatti, parts of Mannarpuram, Khaja Nagar and SIMCO Colony.
title: Power shutdown
